nodes.text: Nara Deega was a male Bith Senator of the New Republic who represented Clak'dor VII and the Mayagil Sector c. 16 ABY and was replaced by E'noro. He was named to the Defense Council after replacing Tig Peramis.
It is possible that Deega was the unnamed Bith senator that was sent on a diplomatic mission to the Roche system in The Courtship of Princess Leia.
